name: Anime Character Analyzer
description: A fun Farcaster Mini App that analyzes your posts to determine which anime character you're most like! Built with Next.js, powered by MiniKit, and featuring 15 unique anime characters from popular series.

impact.description: Bringing anime culture to Farcaster through an engaging personality analyzer that has entertained thousands of users

metrics.users: Growing user base discovering their anime alter egos
metrics.engagement: High sharing rate through Farcaster frames
metrics.community: Building bridges between anime fans and crypto communities

funding.purpose: Continue development, add more characters, improve AI analysis, and expand to other social platforms
